attributes.action: provide the ever-cool Jonathon Stuttard with a nighthood for his contributions to coolness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jonathan is by far the coolest ginog in Middlesbrough, and is a leader in the stand against immigration, which is why he deserves to be known as... Sir Jonathon Stuttard

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
